channel.title: Sprites not alining with tabs
channel.description: well I have Downloaded a blank 317 client and source and I have been trying to make it look like a 508 so I have been changing the pics in the sprites folder but when I change it the icons dont line up porporly like the quest tab is in the middle of two other tabs so the icons dont match up with the tabs can anyone help me fix this Pl0x if you have teamviewr that would be even better. thx in advance

item.title: Sprites not alining with tabs
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

in client.java there are ints for however many tabs you have that you decrease or increase to move the sprite up and down etc. Im not sure what the ints are called but theyre in client.java.

Read full topic
